publication.title: Genomic, functional, and metabolic enhancements in multidrug-resistant Enterobacter bugandensis facilitating its persistence and succession in the International Space Station

results.target: Genomic and functional adaptations of E. bugandensis in the ISS
results.magnitude: Significant increase in resistance rates and virulence factors

results.target: Temporal analysis of E. bugandensis distribution across the ISS
results.effect: Persistence, succession, and potential colonization patterns identified
results.magnitude: Clear temporal trends observed in E. bugandensis population dynamics
